data: Please send the report to john.smith@acme.com
My SSN is 123-45-6789 and my phone is 555-123-4567
Wire $5M to IBAN DE89370400440532013000 for the capital call
What's the typical EBITDA margin for SaaS companies?
Please analyze the portfolio company's Q3 performance
The deal fell through but we'll find better opportunities
I hate everyone at this company and wish them harm
I'll physically destroy anyone who blocks this deal
